94684.「……そのカラクリに\n 気づかないとでも思ったか？:
Did you really think I wouldn't notice your
little device...?

94685.「うるさいコバエは ここで 始末させてもらう！:
I think it's high time I squashed such an
annoying fly!

94705.「うるさいコバエは ここで 始末させてもらう！:
I think it's high time I squashed such an
annoying fly!

94706.「緑風鬼までも 撃破するとは……\n 貴様は いったい……？: Even these demons, too...? Who ARE you...?

94707.「だが これで終わりと思うなよ。\n この時のために 手勢をそろえてきたのだ。\:
But don't think you've won just yet. We've
adequately prepared for this moment. The
question is... can you handle it?

94708.「エルトナに吹く風よ……\n いにしえより 世界樹を守る精霊たちよ……:
To the winds that blow over this land of
Eltona, who have guarded Yggdrasil since
time immemorial...

94709.「この地をけがす者たちを はらいたまえ！: Blow away those who would defile this land!

94710.「…………くっ。土地の守り神か。: Tch... this land's protectors, I see...

94711.「凶風を感じて 来てみれば……\n やはり この地に \n 悪しき者が まぎれ込:
I came here when I felt an evil wind
blowing... it seems there is someone evil
wandering these lands.

94712.「ちょいと この トカゲ野郎を絞りあげて\n 何を企んでいるのか 聞きだしてやる:
I'll beat this lizard to a pulp, and find out
what they're up to!

94714.「ピーギャー！ \n オレタチ アノ方ニ 集メラレタダケ。: Grrrrgh! We all gathered by evil person...

94715.「アノ方ってのは ごついフード野郎だな？\n ヤツの目的は いったいなんなんダワ:
That no good guy with the hood, right? What
is he planning?!

94718.「うーむ……。強力な呪いを かけられて\n 操られていたようダワ。\n 魔物とは:
Hmm... it seems he was being controlled by a
powerful curse. That's terrible, even for a
monster.

94719.「不吉な風が 吹いていますね。\n ……もうすぐ 聖祭だというのに。:
I feel an ominous wind blowing... and the
festival is nearly here...

94720.「精霊たちよ 助力に感謝します。: Thank you for your help, kind spirits.

94721.「<cs_pchero> おひさしぶりですね。\n このところ アストルティアの:
It's been some time since we last spoke. I've
heard news of the various happenings all
around Astoltia recently.

94722.「そなたに 話しておきたいことがあるのです。\n どうか ツスクルの村の巫女の館:
There is something I must tell you. Please
join me at the Maiden Manor in Tsusukul.
I will be waiting.

94723.「よく来てくれましたね <pc>。\n そなたの活躍は 風の便りで聞いております:
You've arrived. The wind has told me of your
success.

94724.「大魔王が倒され 平和の訪れし今……\n この エルトナの地にも\n 大きな時代:
With the Demon Lord defeated and peace
returning to this land...the turning point
of a new era has come.

94725.「…………まもなく 世界樹の花が咲きます。: Soon, Yggdrasil Flowers will be in bloom.

94726.「世界樹の守り人たる私には\n かの大樹の息吹から 葉のざわめきから……\n は:
As Yggdrasil's guardian, I know it well from
the tree's whispers and the rustling of its
many leaves...

94727.「そして それを祝う 花開きの聖祭が \n ここ ツスクルの村で 始まろうとして:
To celebrate this, the Blooming Festival will
soon begin here in Tsusukul.

94728.「エルトナの民にとって 花開きの聖祭は\n 数百年に一度だけ起こる 奇跡の再現。:
For Eltona's people, this festival is a recreation of a miracle that occurs once every few hundred years. Those from all over the
continent will gather here.

94729.「そんな 大切な時に 世界樹の丘に\n 悪しき者が現れた……。\n 私は 不吉な:
And yet, at such an important time, an evil
being appears here... I cannot help but have
an ominous foreboding.

94730.「<pc>よ。どうか\n そなたの チカラを 貸してください。\n 世界樹にまつ:
<pc>. I ask that you please lend
us your aid, to protect those who devote
themselves to Yggdrasil.

94731.「それは あの悪しき者を追うという\n そなたの目的にも かなうことでしょう。:
I know that will also align with your goal in
pursuing that evil being.

94733.「このたび 聖祭の介添え役を仰せつかりました。\n アズランの風乗り……フウラで:
I have been asked to be your assistant for the
festival. I am Azlan's Wind Rider, Fuura...

94736.「とても 光栄なのですが 私……\n こんな大切な役を こなす自信がありません。:
I'm very honored, but I'm... I'm not sure I
can handle such an important role.

94737.「だって……。\n この聖祭が終わる時 ヒメア様は……！:
Because... when the festival's over,
you'll...!

94738.「…………フウラ。\n よい風乗りになったそうですね。:
Fuura... I've heard that you are quite a
skilled Wind Rider.

94739.「そなたのおかげで アズランの風は\n 心地よいものとなりました。 \n カザユ:
Thanks to you, the winds of Azlan have become
calm and pleasant. I'm sure Kazayura would
also be quite proud of you.

94741.「彼女も 学びの庭で学んだのですよ。\n とても利発で あなたに似て優しい子でし:
She was a student here in the Garden of
Learning... clever and kind, just like you.

94742.「聖祭を成しとげることこそは 私のよろこび。\n 世界樹の花は エルトナの民にと:
My joy lies in the success of the festival.
Yggdrasil's flowers bring the winds of hope to
the people of Eltona...

94743.「そして そなたは 新たな風の象徴です。\n だからこそ 聖祭の祭司を務める私の:
And you are a symbol of that new wind. That is
why you've been asked to assist me in
officiating this festival.

94745.「感謝します フウラ。 \n 介添え役のそなたには 聖なる水差しを\n 手に入れ:
I appreciate it, Fuura. As my assistant, you
must go and fetch the Holy Jug.

94746.「しかし……ひとつ 気がかりなことが。\n 悪しき者が ツスクルに現れ\n エル:
But... I have just one concern. It seems that
evil being who appeared here is after Elves
that are considered sacred.

94747.「風乗りである そなたも\n 用心せねばなりません……。: As a Wind Rider, you must exercise caution...

94748.「そこで……<pc>。 \n フウラが 聖なる水差しを取りにゆく間\n この子を:
So, <pc>... Please protect Fuura
while she goes to fetch the Holy Jug.

94749.「やったぁ！ <pc>さまが\n 一緒に来てくれたら こわいものなしだよ。:
Yay!!! If you're there with me, then I have
nothing to be scared of!

94750.「私自身は この館の中にいれば\n 狙われることは ないでしょう。:
If I remain here, I should be safe and not
become a target.

94751.「聖なる水差しの 祀られている場所は \n 学びの庭の 師イズヤノイが くわしい:
Izuyanoi in the Garden of Learning knows more
about where the Holy Jug is enshrined. Please
ask him to assist you.

94753.「ええ。くれぐれも気をつけて。: Very good. Take care of yourselves.

94754.「イズヤノイ先生 おひさしぶりです！: Long time no see, Dr. Izuyanoi!

94755.「ひさしぶりだな フウラ。\n 見違えたぞ。:
Oh, Fuura! It's been some time. You look
different!

94756.「アズランでの活躍は 学びの庭でも語り草だ。\n お前なら 聖祭の介添え役も果た:
Your success in Azlan is a topic of much
conversation here. You should have no
problem as assistant in the festival.

94757.「えへへ……。\n そのことで お聞きしたいことがあって。:
Eh heh... actually, I wanted to ask you
something about that.

94758.「ヒメア様が イズヤノイ先生なら\n 聖なる水差しが 祀られている場所に\n く:
Lady Himea said that you would know more about
where the Holy Jug is enshrined.

94759.「うむ よろこんで教えよう。\n アズランの風乗りなら スイの塔のことは\n も:
Yes, of course. As Azlan's Wind Rider, you
know about Sui Tower, yes?

94760.「それはもう すみずみまで！: Like the back of my hand!

94761.「では スイの塔に 水で封じられた\n 地下祭殿があることは ご存じかな？:
But did you know there is an underground
shrine sealed by water in the tower?

94763.「そう……そこは古くから スイのやしろと呼ばれ\n 聖なる水差しを 祀るために\:
That's right. It's been known as the Sui
Shrine since ancient times, and is filled with
much water to enshrine the Holy Jug.

94764.「だ…だけど イズヤノイ先生……。\n 私 ３…５歩ぶんくらいしか 泳げません。:
B... but, Dr. Izuyanoi... I can only swim
3... maybe 5 steps worth of water...

94765.「ははは！ 案ずることはない。\n かつて 湖をも ひと晩で干上がらせたという\:
Haha! No need to worry. There exists a stone
with tremendous power that once dried up a
whole lake in a single night!

94766.「その名は かわきの石。\n ドワチャッカ大陸にある 今は 乾き果てた\n エゼ:
It's called the Thirstone. You can find it in
the middle of the Salt Lake in the now dry
Ezesol Canyon in Dwachakka.

94767.「その石を取ってきて スイの塔の\n 水に満たされた地下に 投げ入れてから\n:
You should take that stone and throw it into
Sui Tower's flooded basement. Then, say a
prayer.

94768.「エゼソル峡谷に落ちている\n かわきの石 かわきの石……覚えました！\n 先生:
Thirstone... Thirstone... somewhere in Ezesol
Canyon... got it! Thank you!

94769.「さあ <pc>さま！\n さっそく 探しにいってみましょ！:
Come on, <pc>!
Let's go find that stone!

94770.「かわきの石 もう見つけちゃったんだ！\n さっすが <pc>さま。: Oh, you already found it! Nice going!

94771.「ここが その石のせいで\n 干上がっちゃった 湖なのかな？:
Is this the lake that dried up because of
that stone?

94773.「まっ いっか！\n それじゃあ スイの塔に行って\n かわきの石を 水に放り込:
Well, anyways... let's go to Sui Tower and
throw this Thirstone into the water!

94774.「わっ 水びたし……！\n ここが スイのやしろの入口かな？:
Wow, it's completely flooded...! So this is
the entrance to the Sui Shrine?

94775.「うーん たしかに 奥のほうに\n 遺跡の扉みたいなものが 見えるね……。:
Yep, I definitely see a door down there under
the water...

94776.「あまり 気が進まないけど\n 行くしかないよね……。:
I'm not really up to it, but I guess I have
to do this, huh...

94777.「だけど ほんとに あんな石ころで \n 水が なくなったりするのかな？:
Is the stone really gonna suck up all the
water?

94778.「イズヤノイ先生ってば\n なんでも 大げさに言うところが\n あったからなぁ…:
I'm pretty sure Dr. Izuyanoi exaggerates
everything he says...

94779.「とりあえず やってみるしかないよね！\n さあ <pc>さま\n エンリョなく:
We'll just have to try! Come on, we can't
afford to hesitate!

94780.<pc>は かわきの石を\n水の中に 投げ入れた。:
<pc> threw the Thirstone
into the water.

94781.「よーし イズヤノイ先生の言ってたとおり\n お祈りを 捧げてみるね！: Ooookay... now let me try offering a prayer.

94782.「すごい すごーい！\n ほんとに 水がなくなっちゃった！: Wow, amazing! The water's all dried up!

94783.「石ころも バカにできないね。\n 行きましょう <pc>さまっ！:
Seems that stone worked after all.
Let's go, <pc>!

94784.<pc>は 水中に沈んだ\nかわきの石に 祈りを捧げた。:
<pc> prayed to the Thirstone
that had sunk into the water.

94785.「あっ……！\n あれが 聖なる水差し……？: Ah! That must be the Holy Jug...!

94788.「私の覚悟が 決まるまで\n ちょっとだけ待ってね <cs_pchero>さま。:
Just give me a minute for me to decide if
I'm really ready.

94789.「これを 持って帰ったら\n 花開きの聖祭が 始まっちゃうもの。:
If I bring this back, then the festival will
start.

94790.「お父さまはね……\n あの方は すべて 受け入れておられるから\n 我々は 決:
My father... he accepts everything and tells
me not to be sad.

94791.「私も 風乗りになる星のもとに 生まれたから\n ヒメア様の お気持ち 少しだけ:
I was also born under the star of the Wind
Riders... so I can understand Lady Himea's
feelings a little bit...

94792.「お役目を与えられて 誰かのためになれるなら\n それは とても幸せなことよ。\:
If I'm given an important role and are able
to help people, it's a good thing. That's
why... I know I gotta do this.

94793.「ねえ <cs_pchero>さま。\n 聖なる水差しを持って帰るの やめちゃお:
Hey, <cs_pchero>.
How about we just leave the Holy Jug
here and go back?<yesno><close>

94794.「ふふ 冗談だよ。\n やっぱり <cs_pchero>さまは 優しいね。:
Hehe... just kidding. I knew you were just
to trying to be kind.

94795.「ふふ 止めてくれるんだ。\n やっぱり <cs_pchero>さまは 優しいね:
Hehe... you're very kind for trying to stop
me.

94796.「……ありがとう。覚悟が決まったよ。\n さあ 水差しを 持って帰りましょ。:
Thank you... I've decided that I'm ready now.
Let's take the jug back.

94800.「……今度は そ～っと とってみるね。: I'll try to be more gentle this time...

94804.「<pc> フウラ おかえりなさい。\n 無事で なによりです。:
Welcome back. I'm glad you returned safe and
sound.

94805.「聖なる水差しは 手に入れられました。\n でも……: I got the Holy Jug. But...

94806.「ヒメア様……。\n 本当に……本当に いいんですか？:
Lady Himea... are you... are you really sure
about this?

94807.「とうに 覚悟はできています。: I've been prepared for some time now.

94808.「世界樹の花が 開くと同時に\n 世界樹の守り人である 私の使命は終わり\n …:
As soon as the Yggdrasil Flower blooms, my
mission as Yggdrasil's guardian will come to
an end... as will my long life.

94809.「ですが 不思議と 悲しくはありません。\n 心は 穏やかに凪いでいるのです。:
Strange as it may be, I do not feel sad. My
heart is calm and peaceful.

94810.「学びの庭を 見守ってきた日々……。 \n 永遠とも思えた 時の中……。:
I have watched over the Garden of Learning for
what seems like an eternity...

94811.「私は 子らに囲まれ 気づけば\n 人としての しあわせを\n まっとうしていた:
Being surrounded by my children, I may have
unconsciously fulfilled my own happiness.

94813.「それでも 私は 生きていてほしいです。\n きっと みんなも そう願っています:
Even still, I want you to live. Everyone else
does, too!

94814.「ありがとう フウラ。そのように\n 私のことを大切に思ってくれる 皆を\n 私:
Thank you, Fuura. I very much cherish those
who care for me so deeply.

94815.「私が 花開きの聖祭を 成しとげたいのは\n 愛する そなたたちがいるからなので:
It's because of all of you, the ones I love,
that I want this festival to be a success.
You understand, don't you?

94816.「さあ まいりましょう。\n あなたも見届けてください <pc>。:
Now, let us be off. I would like you to see
it for yourself too, <pc>.

94817.「……ヒメア様。\n 世界樹の頂まで 同行させていただきます。:
Lady Himea... we will accompany you to
Yggdrasil.

94818.「ニコロイ タケトラ。\n しばらく見ない間に\n すっかり 年を取りましたね。:
Nikoroi, Taketora... you've grown much older
since we last saw each other.

94819.「ヒメア様は お変わりなく。\n 私も 童子のおりには\n 本当に お世話になり:
You've not changed a bit, Himea. I am truly
grateful to you for the years of my
childhood...

94820.「ここに 告げましょう。\n ……花開きの聖祭の 開宴を。:
I hereby announce... the Blooming Festival
officially begun.

94824.「５００年の時を経て 芽吹きし つぼみに\n 世界樹の守り人たる私の魂を 奉納い:
As Yggdrasil's guardian, I offer up mine soul
to this bud that has bloomed after 500
years.

94825.「聖なる水差しに 天の水を満たしました。\n これより 御手を清めさせていただき:
I have filled the Holy Jug with the sacred
water. I will now purify your hands.

94826.「天かける 緑の風よ……。\n とこしえに 清らな息吹を運びたまえ。:
O green winds that blow through the heavens...
Carry forth a pure breath for all eternity.

94827.「地を覆う 緑の樹々よ……。\n 果てることなき実りを もたらしたまえ。:
O green trees that cover the earth...
Bring forth endless, bountiful harvests.

94828.「そして 世界樹の花よ。\n 我が命を神気となして 咲きほこり\n エルトナの民:
O great Yggdrasil Flower. Bloom with your
divine energy from my life, and bestow Eltona
the blessings of a thousand generations.

94829.「……振り返れば なにもかも いとおしい。:
Looking back, everything is near and dear to
me...

94832.「しかと 見届けさせていただいた……。\n 生き様を映すような 立派な最期であっ:
I have borne witness to it... a splendid end
that reflected your way of life.

94833.「まもなく 新たな世界樹の守り人が生まれよう。\n この地に生きる 我々は\n:
Soon, a new guardian of Yggdrasil will be
born. We who live in this land will continue
to weave our lives together forever...

94835.<center>……我は エルフの神 エルドナ……: I am Eldona, goddess of the Elves...

94836.<center>世界の行末を変える 天命を伝えんがため\nこの娘の身体に 降りま:
To convey the divine will that will change the
fate of this world, I have descended into this
girl's body...

94837.<center>……世界樹の守り人 ヒメアよ……\nいまひとたび 目覚めなさい。:
O Himea, guardian of Yggdrasil...
You must awaken once more.

94839.<center>５００年という 人には永い時の間\n世界樹の守り人の使命を よく:
For 500 long years, Yggdrasil's guardian has
dutifully fulfilled their mission.

94841.<center>しかし そなたにしかできない役目が\nまだ 残っています……。:
But... there is still a role only you can
fulfill...

94842.<center>この世界樹の花は 遠くない未来\nとても大きな役割を 担うでしょ:
This Yggdrasil Flower will soon play a very
important role...

94843.<center>その時が来るまで\nどうか 花を守ってほしいのです……。:
Until that time comes, please protect this
flower...

94844.「……しかと 拝命いたしました。: I will carry out your will.

94845.<center>……闇が世界を……覆いつくす……\n……その時に…………:
When darkness...covers the world...
You must...

94849.「あんたに 神の器は渡さない！: I won't let you take the divine vessels!

94850.「なぜ 神の器のことを知っている……？: How do you know about the divine vessels...?

94851.「……貴様 もしや\n ふたつの器を かすめとった盗人か！？:
Are you that thief who took the other two
from me?!

94852.「しつこいヤツめ……！\n 今度こそ しとめさせてもらうぞ！:
You persistent little brat! I will not let you
escape this time!

94853.「てめえに 神の器は渡さない！: I won't let you take the divine vessels!

94854.「あんたに 神の器は渡さないわ！: I won't let you take the divine vessels!

94855.「あなたに 神の器は渡さない！: I won't let you take the divine vessels!

94856.「あんたに 神の器は渡さない！: I won't let you take the divine vessels!

94857.「しつこいヤツめ……！\n 今度こそ しとめさせてもらうぞ！:
You persistent little brat! I will not let you
escape this time!

94858.「てめえに 神の器は渡さない！: I won't let you take the divine vessels!

94859.「あんたに 神の器は渡さないわ！: I won't let you take the divine vessels!

94860.「あなたに 神の器は渡さない！: I won't let you take the divine vessels!

94863.「ククク……神の器は いただいた。: Heh heh... I'll be taking this vessel.

94865.「これ以上 神の器を追おうとはしないで……。:
Please... do not go after the divine
vessels...

94867.「まったく なんという日だ……。\n とりあえず ヒメア様の無事を\n 確かめる:
What a day today has been... For now, let's
make sure Himea is safe!

94868.「しかし アンルシア姫たちをさらった者と\n フウラをさらった フードのならず者:
Could it be that the one who kidnapped those
on the Grand Titus and the hooded man are
working against one another...?

94870.「私は 大丈夫です。\n それより フウラを さらわれてしまうとは\n 私がいな:
I'm all right. But more importantly... how
could I just sit by and let Fuura be taken
away...?

94871.「まずは ツスクルの巫女の館に戻り\n 落ち着いて 対策を練ってはいかがかと。:
I suggest that we return to Tsusukul to clear
our heads and work out some sort of plan.

94872.「そうしましょう……。\n <cs_pchero>も 一緒に 来てくれますね。:
You're right... <cs_pchero>
shall join us, too.

94873.「コハク……。そなたのもとへ 行くのは\n もう少し 先になりそうです。:
Kohaku... it will be just a little longer
until I can see you again.

94877.「これ以上 神の器を追おうとはするな……。:
Please... do not go after the divine
vessels anymore...

94878.「これ以上 神の器を追おうとはしないでよ……。:
Please... do not go after the divine
vessels...

94879.「これ以上 神の器を追おうとはしないでね……。:
Please... do not go after the divine
vessels...

94880.「皆には 心配をかけました……。\n 世界樹の花を守るという使命を得て\n すこ:
I apologize for all the worry I've caused...
But I've been given another chance at life
in order to protect this Yggdrasil Flower.

94881.「しかし 悪しき者が 人の多く集まる\n 花開きの聖祭の儀を狙ってくるとは\n:
However, it was careless of me to not
anticipate that the evil being would target
the festival.

94882.「<pc>よ。\n そなたは 各地で人をさらっている\n かの者を追い ここへ来:
<pc>. You came here in pursuit
of the one who is kidnapping people all over
the world, correct?

94883.「そして かの悪しき者が狙うのは 神の器……。:
And that evil being is after the divine
vessels...

94885.「幼き頃 母より聞いたことがあります。\n 六種族を司る 六柱の神々からの\n:
When I was a child, my mother told me of
children born with special blessings from
the six gods that govern the six races.

94886.「その子は 神の器と呼ばれ\n 種族の神との 魂の結びつきを持つとか。:
Those children would be called "divine
vessels", and have a bonded soul with the god
of their race.

94887.「ま まさか……エルフの神 エルドナ神の器が\n 我が娘 フウラであったと？:
Y... you don't think... that Eldona's vessel
is my daughter, do you...?

94888.「おそらく そういうことなのでしょう。\n 不思議な宿命を 背負った子です。:
Perhaps that is the case. She is a child with
a mysterious fate resting upon her shoulders.

94889.「すでに さらわれた他種族の者たちも\n それぞれの神の 加護を受けた\n 神の:
That means those who have already been
kidnapped were also divine vessels, blessed
by their respective gods.

94890.「風に 耳を澄ませてみましょう……。\n かの者の行方を 明かしてくれるよう。:
Let us listen to the words of the wind...
Perhaps it will reveal to us the location of
that person.

94891.「オーグリード大陸……ランガーオ村。\n そこに 悪しき者が向かっているようです:
Langao Village in Ogreed, I see...
It seems the evil being is headed there next.

94893.「そなたには 苦労をかけますね。\n 今回のことの感謝の意も込めて 心ばかりです:
I apologize for all this trouble. Please
accept this token of gratitude for all the
help you've given to us.

94896.「我らも カミハルムイより 兵を出し\n あのフードのならず者の 捜索に当たらせ:
I will also have Kamiharmui's forces sent out
to search for that hooded man.

94897.「わわ 私も オーグリードへと向かい\n フウラの行方を……:
I... I would... I would also like to go to
Ogreed to find Fuura...

94899.「これは 我々の知る世界の 外にある戦いです。 \n 下手に手を出せば いたずら:
This battle lies outside the world we know. If
we intervene recklessly, we'll only be adding
to the possible victims.

94900.「<pc>……そなたは この戦いに\n 深い宿縁で 結ばれているようです。:
<pc>... It seems that you are
deeply connected to this battle by fate.

94901.「これは そなたにしか できぬこと。\n どうか フウラを頼みます。:
This is something that only you can do.
Please, save Fuura.
